items.sentence: Tom\'s disappearance completely baffled the police.
Tom\'s health has been deteriorating for some time.
Tom\'s operation was going to cost a small fortune.
I haven\'t found a way to stop Tom from doing that.
Don\'t force Tom to do that if he doesn\'t want to.
Don\'t force yourself to eat if you don\'t want to.
How many hours a day does she spend in the kitchen?
Didn\'t you know Tom isn\'t planning on doing that?
Tom heard a strange sound coming from the basement.
Tom intends to live in Boston for more than a year.
